title: Coronavirus Market Fears, 2020 Campaign
itunes:title: Coronavirus Market Fears, 2020 Campaign
description:
Kevin talked to Bloomberg Macro Strategist Cameron Crise about today's market anxiety over the spread of the coronavirus, as stocks fell the most since August 2011.

Panel guests: Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group and Dave Brown, Democratic Strategist & former advisor to Sen. Patty Murray.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
